bossDialog: (The Grimoire immediately starts casting a curse as soon as you approach it. Not wanting to be any more cursed than usual, you order your creatures to put a stop to it.)
There are over 5,000 ways to utterly humiliate you contained within my pages. Are you SURE you want to fight me?
You've learned how to use magic? Cute. I'm the one people learn to use magic FROM. Let me show you how it's done.

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_ARCANE} buffs have a 5% chance to grant the Spell Gem an extra {STAT_charge} when it activates.
cardBonuses.5: Your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_ARCANE} buffs have a 10% chance to not be removed after they cast a spell.
cardBonuses.8: Doubles the chance for these effects to occur.

master.dialog: Grimoires are great for powering up certain Spell Gems to make them even stronger yet. Care to see what I mean? Let's duel!
